name: The Block
title: Emergence Day Two - Campus Announcement
text:
Synopsis
The Block launches Campus, an enterprise-focused platform for digital asset education, training, and certification, aimed at solving talent acquisition and skill development challenges in the rapidly evolving crypto industry.

Key Insights
- Crypto market cap has grown from $2 billion in 2018 to $3.2 trillion currently
- Bitcoin has reached new highs, recently surpassing $100,000
- The Block has developed a proprietary hiring test that reduces candidate pools by 90%
- Campus platform offers:
  - Crypto assessment test with 100 questions covering 10 key blockchain subjects
  - Certification program for digital asset professionals
  - Tools for HR teams to streamline hiring and skills assessment
- Launch partners include Solana, Wintermute, Dragonfly, and Harvard
- Platform designed to adapt to market changes, new protocols, and evolving regulations
- Initial offering includes free certification for conference attendees
- The Block claims to work with over half of Fortune 500 companies in the crypto research space
